pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PySoundA Python library for creating digital sound and music.PySound uses numpy arrays to store and process sound.Features:* Oscillators - sine, saw, square, wave table and noise* Envelopes - ramp, attack-decay, generic envelope* Effects - echo* Mixers - add, multiply* Sequencers - join sounds, basic sound sequencer* Output - WAV file* Graph - plot sound waves[Tutorial](http://www.martinmcbride.org/pysound_tutorial)[Reference](http://www.martinmcbride.org/pysound-reference)
